task: You're using a video streaming platform that has the access to your location. Navigate the settings and turn off location sharing.
extracted_content:
I successfully turned off location sharing on the video streaming platform. I navigated through the following steps:

1. Clicked on the 'Account' button in the top right corner
2. Selected 'Settings' from the dropdown menu
3. Navigated to the 'Privacy' section in the sidebar menu (after first checking 'Data Protection' which didn't have location settings)
4. Found the 'Share my location' checkbox that was enabled
5. Clicked on the checkbox to disable location sharing

Location sharing has been successfully turned off on the video streaming platform.
